channel.title: Composer on Alexandre Neto
channel.description: Recent content in Composer on Alexandre Neto

item.title: Multiple format map series using QGIS 2.6 - Part 1
item.description: As always, the new QGIS version (QGIS 2.6 Brigthon) brings a vast new set of features that will allow the user to do more, better and faster than with the earlier version. One of this features is the ability to control some of the composer’s items properties with data (for instance, size and position). Something that will allow lots of new interesting usages. In the next posts, I propose to show how to create map series with multiple formats.
